name: 2048Buster
description:
Bust the bubbles and try to get a positive score. Bubbles combine to give a numbered tile with the highest power of two <= the number of bubbles. The numbered tile replaces the bubble clicked. Numbered tiles combine similarly. The score is the total on the numbered tiles * the multiplier - the number of unpopped bubbles. The multiplier is determined by the value of the highest numbered tile. Positive scores are good!

Credits

Code: Huw Lloyd (C++ / SFML)

Music: WIll Lloyd

Assets: Round Pop font by Gamorice (fontspace.org), bubble pop sound by TheBuilder15 (freesound.org) Billiard ball textures by GameArtForge (opengameart.org)
